name: Fill It Up 2D
description:
Hi all,

I have been learning Unity for a while and one day I simply realized that I have been caught in a "learning loop". So I made the decision to just develop and release a game no matter what.

This is a prototype of my first game. I will update it as I continue to work on the game.

INSTRUCTIONS

Movement - hold the left mouse button and move to the direction you want to go.

Avoid the Hammer and collect Coffee Bean Bags. Collect more than 3 bags and your coffee cup will be set on fire during which you can collect Hammers for extra points without it destroying the cup.

I know that the game does not look like the game of the dreams, but we all have to start somewhere, right? If you have any suggestions or comments, please leave them in the section below.

Big thanks everyone...
